dsm.parameters

Class Smooth

  • java.lang.Object
    • dsm.parameters.Smooth

  • public class Smooth
extends java.lang.Object
    The class representing the dimensionality smoothing (Smooth) parameter of the DSM. For info about the usage of this parameter see DSM.

    • Method Detail

      • applySmoothing

        public static void applySmoothing()
        This function is used for smoothing the (word, feature) pair values. It can either be used for smoothing the raw frequency counts or the weights, depending on when it is called. It can also be employed on all features or only on non-null features.

      • applySmoothing

        public static <T,V> void applySmoothing(java.util.HashMap<T,java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double>> tuplesMap,
                                        java.util.HashSet<T> allWordSet,
                                        java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double> frequency2Map,
                                        java.util.HashMap<T,java.lang.Long[]> word1KNSNCountsMap,
                                        java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Long[]> word2KNSNCountsMap,
                                        java.lang.Long[] allKNSNCounts)
        This function is used for smoothing the (word, feature) pair values in @param tuplesMap.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of keys in @param tuplesMap
        V - the type of values in @param tuplesMap
        Parameters:
        tuplesMap - the map containing the (word, feature) pairs
        allWordSet - the set containing all the input words of the given POS
        frequency2Map - the map containing the frequency of features
        word1KNSNCountsMap - the map containing the KNSN counts for the words
        word2KNSNCountsMap - the map containing the KNSN counts for the features
        allKNSNCounts - the array containing the allKNSN counts for the given feature type
